meanings.sent1: She wore the hippest clothes to the party.
meanings.sent2: The store always carries the hippest trends.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog looked hippest in those sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: Her style was the hippest in the entire school.
meanings.sent5: The hippest sneakers made him stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: He was known as the hippest in the group.
meanings.sent2: The hippest of all the dancers was awarded a prize.
meanings.sent3: The hippest of the bunch always had the best jokes.
meanings.sent4: Being the hippest meant he was always ahead of the game.
meanings.sent5: The hippest of them all had a unique sense of style.
